full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GIS SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU NGAR YANG, ,MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN RUNG BZHIG MI SNANG BAS KHAMS RGYUN 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA SHAR MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR PHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
